title: Sovereign AGI Execution Result Schema
description: Defines the outcome, metrics, and resulting state changes after a completed AGI execution cycle, complementing the initial Execution Context.

execution_id.description: References the unique identifier from the associated Execution Context.

timestamp_end.description: ISO 8601 timestamp marking the completion time.

status.description: Final termination status of the execution.

output_state_hash.description: Cryptographic root hash (SHA-256) of the resulting target filesystem state or artifact directory produced by the AGI.

max_memory_mb.description: Peak system memory usage observed during the run.

model_usage.description: Details on tokens consumed by the underlying LLMs.
